data.Sentence_cn: 萨莉第一交乘火车旅行
上周，我4岁的女儿萨莉被邀请去参加一个儿童聚会。
data.Sentence: Last week, my four-year-old daughter, Sally, was invited to a children's party.
I decided to take her by train.

data.Sentence_cn: 萨莉非常激动，因为她从未乘过火车。
data.Sentence: Sally was very excited because she had never travelled on a train before.

data.Sentence_cn: 她靠车窗坐着，对她所看到的一切都要问个明白。
data.Sentence: She sat near the window and asked questions about everything she saw.

data.Sentence_cn: 突然，一个中年妇女上了火车，坐在萨莉的对面。
data.Sentence: Suddenly, a middle-age lady got on the train and sat opposite Sally.

data.Sentence_cn: 萨莉没回答，却好奇地看着她。
data.Sentence: Sally did not answer, but looked at her curiously.

data.Sentence_cn: 那位妇女穿着一件蓝色的大衣，戴着一顶大而滑稽的帽子。
data.Sentence: The lady was dressed in a blue coat and a large, funny hat.

data.Sentence_cn: 火车开出车站后，那位妇女找开了手提包，拿出了粉盒。
data.Sentence: After the train had left the station, the lady opened her handbag and took out her powder compact.
She then began to make up her face.

data.Sentence_cn: “你为什么要那样做呢？”萨莉问。
data.Sentence: 'Why are you doing that?' Sally asked.

data.Sentence_cn: “为了把自己打扮漂亮啊，”那位妇女答道。
data.Sentence: 'To make myself beautiful,' the lady answered.

data.Sentence_cn: 她放好了粉盒，慈祥地微笑着。
data.Sentence: She put away her compact and smiled kindly.
'But you are still ugly,' Sally said.

data.Sentence_cn: 萨莉感到很有趣，而我却很尴尬。
data.Sentence: Sally was amused, but I was very embarrassed!

title.title_cn: 萨莉第一交乘火车旅行
title.title: Sally's first train ride
